org.apache.flink.streaming.runtime.io

类 StreamRecordWriter<T extends IOReadableWritable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.api.writer.RecordWriter<T>
      • org.apache.flink.streaming.runtime.io.StreamRecordWriter<T>
  • 类型参数:
    T - The type of elements written.

    @Internal
public class StreamRecordWriter<T extends IOReadableWritable>
extends RecordWriter<T>
    This record writer keeps data in buffers at most for a certain timeout. It spawns a separate thread that flushes the outputs in a defined interval, to make sure data does not linger in the buffers for too long.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private class  StreamRecordWriter.OutputFlusher
      A dedicated thread that periodically flushes the output buffers, to set upper latency bounds.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private static java.lang.String DEFAULT_OUTPUT_FLUSH_THREAD_NAME
      Default name for teh output flush thread, if no name with a task reference is given.
      private boolean flushAlways
      Flag indicating whether the output should be flushed after every element.
      private java.lang.Throwable flusherException
      The exception encountered in the flushing thread.
      private StreamRecordWriter.OutputFlusher outputFlusher
      The thread that periodically flushes the output, to give an upper latency bound.

        targetPartition

        public void close()
